name: Awesome Sysadmin
description: A curated list of amazingly awesome open source sysadmin resources.

items.title: Amanda
items.description: Client-server model backup tool

items.title: Attic
items.description: A deduplicating backup program written in Python

items.title: Bacula
items.description: Another Client-server model backup tool

items.title: Bareos
items.description: A fork of Bacula backup tool

items.title: Barman
items.description: Backup and Recovery Manager for disaster recovery of PostgreSQL servers

items.title: Backupninja
items.description: Lightweight, extensible meta-backup system

items.title: Backuppc
items.description: Client-server model backup tool with file pooling scheme

items.title: Brebis
items.description: A fully automated backup checker

items.title: Bup
items.description: Incremental backups with rolling checksums, git packfiles, de-duplication, and a FUSE filesystem

items.title: Burp
items.description: Network backup and restore program

items.title: Duplicati
items.description: Multiple backends, encryption, web-ui and multi-OS backup tool

items.title: Duplicity
items.description: Encrypted bandwidth-efficient backup using the rsync algorithm

items.title: FreeFileSync
items.description: Folder comparison and synchronization tool

items.title: Lsyncd
items.description: File Monitor which spawns a process to synchronize the changes (rsync by default)

items.title: restic
items.description: Fast, secure, efficient backup program

items.title: Rsnapshot
items.description: Filesystem Snapshotting Utility

items.title: SafeKeep
items.description: Centralized pull-based backup using

items.title: Snebu
items.description: Snapshot backup with global multi-client deduplication and transparent compression

items.title: UrBackup
items.description: Another client-server backup system

items.title: ZBackup
items.description: A versatile deduplicating backup tool

items.title: Backup
items.description: Provides an elegant DSL in Ruby for performing backups on UNIX-like systems

items.title: DREBS
items.description: AWS EBS backup script that supports strategies

items.description: Automation build tool, similar to make, written in Java

items.description: Build automation tool mainly for Java

items.description: The most popular automation build tool for many purposes

items.description: Another open source build automation system

items.description: A customizable, life embetterment robot

items.description: A robot companion for your company's chat room

items.description: Another computer cloning solution
